mapper.select: SELECT b.lecture_no AS lectureNo, b.lecture_name AS lectureName, b.lecture_price AS lecturePrice, b.room_num AS roomNum, b.lecture_time AS lectureTime, b.lecture_day AS lectureDay, b.start_date AS startDate, b.end_date AS endDate FROM wishlist a JOIN lecture b ON a.lecture_no = b.lecture_no WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_date;
